actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize the Secretary of the Senate to withhold from salaries of Senate pages, and deposit in the House revolving fund for pages, amounts equal to the charges imposed on pages residing in the page residence hall.

summary.text: Authorizes the withholding of amounts from the salaries of Senate pages for deposit in the House revolving fund to pay for the page residence hall and meals.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize the Secretary of the Senate to withhold from salaries of Senate pages, and deposit in the House revolving fund for pages, amounts equal to the charges imposed on pages residing in the page residence hall.
